title: Lotus Cafe and Juice Bar
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Juice bar, Take-out, Mexican, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Menu is vegetarian with some fish and poultry. Vegan, vegetarian, and gluten-free choices are marked. Offers breakfast, fresh salads, fruit smoothies, organic carrot and veggie juice, wheatgrass, and 2 daily soups. Spacious dining are. Order at the counter, and food is brought to your table.
